channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Symphony
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Symphony

item.title: CVE-2018-1702|2024-08-05T04:07:44.370Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20symphony
item.description: IBM Platform Symphony 7.1 Fix Pack 1 and 7.1.1 and IBM Spectrum Symphony 7.1.2 and 7.2.0.2 are vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 146189.

item.title: CVE-2018-1708|2024-08-05T04:07:44.327Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20symphony
item.description: IBM Spectrum Symphony 7.1.2 and 7.2.0.2 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive user information such as passwords through the WebUI. IBM X-Force ID: 146343.

item.title: CVE-2018-1706|2024-08-05T04:07:44.370Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20symphony
item.description: IBM Spectrum Symphony 7.2.0.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 146341.

item.title: CVE-2018-1595|2024-08-05T04:07:43.993Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20symphony
item.description: IBM Spectrum Symphony and Platform Symphony 7.1.2 and 7.2.0.2 could allow an authenticated user to execute arbitrary commands due to improper handling of user supplied input. IBM X-Force ID: 143622.
